message: The SDG_CUSTODIAN_AGENCIES field for indicator 15-3-1, translated into en
data: United Nations Convention to Combat Desertification (UNCCD) and partners, including the Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations (FAO), United Nations Statistics Division (UNSD), United Nations Environment (UNEP), United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change (UNFCCC) and Convention on Biological Diversity (CBD).
